THE FORD FOUNDATION
477 MADISON AVENUE
NEW YORK 22, N. Y
May 3, 1961
Miss Joan P. Hughes
NAEB
DuPont Circle Office Building
13*i6 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D.C.
Dear Miss Hughes:
Ifhank you for your letter of April 28 attaching
the list of names to receive our latest Booklet
on educational television.
(Ehanks, too, for the nice things you had to say
about the booklet itself.
Yours truly.
Lilian D. Plante
LDP/w
